title: Skirt
description: black waistband, 6\" wide with 38\" ties; blue and white pleated batik bordered with bands of solid red and yellow; alternating diamond and maze-like pattern in red, white and green; bottom reverse has 5\" lined in coarse-weave fabric
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
